Source code for havoc.autoval.tests.storage.flash.rocksdb.rocksdb

from __future__ import absolute_import
from __future__ import division
from __future__ import print_function
from __future__ import unicode_literals
import os
import re
import time

from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.storage.storage_test_base import StorageTestBase
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.filesystem_utils import FilesystemUtils
from havoc.autotest_testfiles.validation_utils.lib.site_utils import SiteUtils
from havoc.autoval.lib.test_utils.storage.drive import DriveType



[docs]class RocksDB(StorageTestBase):

[docs]    def __init__(self):
        super(RocksDB, self).__init__()
        logdirs = SiteUtils().get_log_dirs()
        self.resultsdir = logdirs["resultsdir"]
        tool_path = SiteUtils().get_tool_path()
        self.db_bench = os.path.join(tool_path, "db_bench")



[docs]    def setup(self, *args, **kwargs):
        super(RocksDB, self).setup(*args, **kwargs)
        self.test_drives = self.get_test_drives_from_drives(
            drive_type=DriveType.SSD.value,
            interface=self.test_control.get("drive_interface", None),
            model=self.test_control.get("drive_model", None),
        )



[docs]    def execute(self):
        fstype = "xfs"
        mnt_options = "noatime,nodiratime,discard,nobarrier"
        filesystem_options = "-K -i size=2048"
        self.validate_condition(self.drives, "Check for usable target in lsblk")
        for dev in self.drives:
            mnt = "/mnt/havoc_%s" % (dev.block_name)
            FilesystemUtils.mount(
                self.host, dev.block_name, mnt, mnt_options, fstype, filesystem_options
            )
            df = FilesystemUtils.get_df_info(self.host, dev.block_name)
            self.validate_condition(
                df["type"] == fstype, "Mounted %s at %s" % (dev.block_name, mnt)
            )
            # self.test_drives contains list of ssd drives on which
            # fstrim operation is performed to discard any unused blocks
            if dev in self.test_drives:
                mnt = "/mnt/havoc_%s" % (dev.block_name)
                self.validate_no_exception(
                    FilesystemUtils.fstrim, [self.host, mnt], "Trim on %s" % (mnt)
                )

        self.setup_rocksdb(mnt=mnt)



[docs]    def cleanup(self):
        for dev in self.drives:
            mnt = "/mnt/havoc_%s" % (dev.block_name)
            self.log_info("cleaning up drive: %s" % dev.block_name)
            FilesystemUtils.clean_filesystem(self.host, dev.block_name, mnt)
        super(RocksDB, self).cleanup()



[docs]    def setup_rocksdb(self, mnt=""):
        # Define I/O files and directories
        db_dir = mnt + "/db"
        wal_dir = mnt + "/db"
        if mnt:
            # Create db and output directories
            self.host.run("mkdir -p %s" % db_dir)
            self.host.run("mkdir -p %s" % db_dir + "/0")
        # Set ulimit
        self.host.run("ulimit -n 65536")

        # Some dirty regular expressions
        qps_re = r"^.*micros/op\s+(\d+)\s+ops/sec"
        latency_re = (
            r"rocksdb.db.get.micros.*50\s+:\s+(\d+.\d+)"
            r"\s+95\s+:\s+(\d+.\d+)\s+99\s+:\s+(\d+.\d+)"
        )

        # Define size constants
        K = 1024
        M = 1024 * K
        G = 1024 * M
        n = 125 * M
        duration = 6 * 60 * 60
        num_read_threads = 48
        cache_size = 16 * G
        num_keys = n
        key_size = 20
        value_size = 800

        # Define constant params
        const_params = (
            " --db="
            + str(db_dir)
            + " --wal_dir="
            + str(wal_dir)
            + " --num_levels="
            + str(6)
            + " --key_size="
            + str(key_size)
            + " --value_size="
            + str(value_size)
            + " --block_size="
            + str(4096)
            + " --cache_size="
            + str(cache_size)
            + " --cache_numshardbits="
            + str(6)
            + " --compression_type="
            + str("snappy")
            + " --compression_ratio="
            + str(0.5)
            + " --hard_rate_limit="
            + str(2)
            + " --rate_limit_delay_max_milliseconds="
            + str(1000000)
            + " --write_buffer_size="
            + str(int(128 * M))
            + " --max_write_buffer_number="
            + str(2)
            + " --target_file_size_base="
            + str(int(128 * M))
            + " --max_bytes_for_level_base="
            + str(int(1 * G))
            + " --sync="
            + str(0)
            + " --verify_checksum="
            + str(1)
            + " --delete_obsolete_files_period_micros="
            + str(int(60 * M))
            + " --statistics="
            + str(1)
            + " --stats_per_interval="
            + str(1)
            + " --stats_interval="
            + str(int(1 * M))
            + " --histogram="
            + str(1)
            + " --memtablerep="
            + str("skip_list")
            + " --bloom_bits="
            + str(10)
            + " --open_files="
            + str(int(20 * K))
        )
        l0_config = (
            "--level0_file_num_compaction_trigger=8"
            + " --level0_slowdown_writes_trigger=16"
            + " --level0_stop_writes_trigger=24"
        )
        if duration > 0:
            const_params = const_params + " --duration=" + str(duration)

        # Define benchmark params
        params_r = (
            const_params
            + " "
            + l0_config
            + " --max_background_compactions=4"
            + " --max_background_flushes=1"
        )
        params_w = (
            const_params
            + " "
            + l0_config
            + " --max_background_compactions=16"
            + " --max_background_flushes=16"
        )

        # Now run rocksdb tests
        # Test. Fill sequential
        curr_time = time.time()
        # fillseq_out = self.run_fillseq(params_w, num_keys)
        fillseq_out = self.validate_no_exception(
            self.run_fillseq, [params_w, num_keys], "Rocksdb fillseq on %s" % (mnt)
        )
        fillseq_time = time.time() - curr_time
        fillseq_op = (
            "Start fillseq at "
            + time.strftime("%c")
            + "\n"
            + fillseq_out
            + "\nCompleted fillseq in "
            + str(fillseq_time)
            + " seconds\n"
        )
        # Add benchmark results in test_results.json file
        self.result_handler.add_test_results({"fillseq_benchmarks": fillseq_op})

        # Test. Overwrite
        curr_time = time.time()
        overwrite_out = self.validate_no_exception(
            self.run_overwrite, [params_w, num_keys], "Rocksdb overwrite on %s" % (mnt)
        )
        overwrite_time = time.time() - curr_time
        overwrite_op = (
            "Start overwrite at "
            + time.strftime("%c")
            + "\n"
            + overwrite_out
            + "\nCompleted overwrite in "
            + str(overwrite_time)
            + " seconds\n"
        )
        # Add benchmark results in test_results.json file
        self.result_handler.add_test_results({"overwrite_benchmarks": overwrite_op})

        # Test. Fill unique random
        curr_time = time.time()
        filluniquerandom_out = self.validate_no_exception(
            self.run_filluniquerandom,
            [params_w, num_keys],
            "Rocksdb filluniqerandom on %s" % (mnt),
        )
        filluniquerandom_time = time.time() - curr_time
        filluniquerandom_op = (
            "Start filluniquerandom at "
            + time.strftime("%c")
            + "\n"
            + filluniquerandom_out
            + "\nCompleted filluniquerandom in "
            + str(filluniquerandom_time)
            + " seconds\n"
        )
        # Add benchmark results in test_results.json file
        self.result_handler.add_test_results(
            {"filluniquerandom_benchmarks": filluniquerandom_op}
        )

        # Test. Read Random
        curr_time = time.time()
        readrandom_out = self.validate_no_exception(
            self.run_readrandom,
            [params_r, num_keys, num_read_threads],
            "Rocksdb readrandom on %s" % (mnt),
        )
        readrandom_time = time.time() - curr_time
        for line in readrandom_out.splitlines():
            match = re.search(qps_re, line.strip())
            if match:
                qps = match.group(1)
            match = re.search(latency_re, line.strip())
            if match:
                p50_lat = match.group(1)
                p95_lat = match.group(2)
                p99_lat = match.group(3)
        readrandom_op = (
            "Start readrandom at "
            + time.strftime("%c")
            + "\n"
            + readrandom_out
            + "\nCompleted readrandom in "
            + str(readrandom_time)
            + " seconds\n"
            + "Read latency p50 = "
            + str(p50_lat)
            + " us, p95 = "
            + str(p95_lat)
            + " us, p99 = "
            + str(p99_lat)
            + "\nQPS = "
            + str(qps)
            + " ops/sec"
        )
        # Add benchmark results in test_results.json file
        self.result_handler.add_test_results({"readrandom_benchmarks": readrandom_op})

        # Test. Read while writing
        curr_time = time.time()
        readwhilewriting_out = self.validate_no_exception(
            self.run_readwhilewriting,
            [params_r, num_keys, num_read_threads],
            "Rocksdb readwhilewriting on %s" % (mnt),
        )
        readwhilewriting_time = time.time() - curr_time
        for line in readwhilewriting_out.splitlines():
            match = re.search(qps_re, line.strip())
            if match:
                qps = match.group(1)
            match = re.search(latency_re, line.strip())
            if match:
                p50_lat = match.group(1)
                p95_lat = match.group(2)
                p99_lat = match.group(3)
        readwhilewriting_op = (
            "Start readwhilewriting at "
            + time.strftime("%c")
            + "\n"
            + readwhilewriting_out
            + "\nCompleted readwhilewriting in "
            + str(readwhilewriting_time)
            + " seconds\n"
            + "Read latency p50 = "
            + str(p50_lat)
            + " us, p95 = "
            + str(p95_lat)
            + " us, p99 = "
            + str(p99_lat)
            + "\nQPS = "
            + str(qps)
            + " ops/sec"
        )
        # Add benchmark results in test_results.json file
        self.result_handler.add_test_results(
            {"readwhilewriting_benchmarks": readwhilewriting_op}
        )



[docs]    def run_fillseq(self, params_w, num_keys):
        cmd = (
            self.db_bench
            + " "
            + params_w
            + " --benchmarks=fillseq"
            + " --use_existing_db=0"
            + " --num="
            + str(num_keys)
            + " --threads=1"
        )
        return self.host.run(cmd, timeout=43200)  # noqa



[docs]    def run_overwrite(self, params_w, num_keys):
        cmd = (
            self.db_bench
            + " "
            + params_w
            + " --benchmarks=overwrite"
            + " --use_existing_db=1"
            + " --num="
            + str(num_keys)
            + " --threads=1"
        )
        return self.host.run(cmd, timeout=43200)  # noqa



[docs]    def run_filluniquerandom(self, params_w, num_keys):
        cmd = (
            self.db_bench
            + " "
            + params_w
            + " --benchmarks=filluniquerandom"
            + " --use_existing_db=0"
            + " --num="
            + str(num_keys)
            + " --threads=1"
        )
        return self.host.run(cmd, timeout=43200)  # noqa



[docs]    def run_readrandom(self, params_r, num_keys, num_read_threads):
        cmd = (
            self.db_bench
            + " "
            + params_r
            + " --benchmarks=readrandom"
            + " --use_existing_db=1"
            + " --num="
            + str(num_keys)
            + " --threads="
            + str(num_read_threads)
            + " --disable_auto_compactions=1"
        )
        return self.host.run(cmd, timeout=43200)  # noqa



[docs]    def run_readwhilewriting(self, params_r, num_keys, num_read_threads):
        cmd = (
            self.db_bench
            + " "
            + params_r
            + " --benchmarks=readwhilewriting"
            + " --use_existing_db=1"
            + " --num="
            + str(num_keys)
            + " --threads="
            + str(num_read_threads)
        )
        return self.host.run(cmd, timeout=43200)  # noqa




[docs]def main():
    test = RocksDB()
    test.lifecycle()



if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
